AccSnap.Name: Mario Kart Tour Account Snapshot
AccSnap.Description: Using a given file dump of your Mario Kart Tour profile, you can see various stats and the full snapshot of your profile! This is no longer being supported as of the Samurai Tour.

MKTV.Name: Mario Kart Tour Item Values
MKTV.Description: A retired tool to help you compare your most valuable items and their high level courses visually!

PeaceAndTranquil.Name: Peace and Tranquilility
PeaceAndTranquil.Description: No one is around to help.
